## バッテリー電圧

```{r}
esp32 %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=DATE_TTIME, y=BATTERY_VOLT)) +
  geom_point() + 
  #geom_line() +

  theme_bw()
```

## 室温

```{r}
esp32 %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = c(ADT7410_TEMP, SHTC30_TEMP), names_to = "SENSOR", values_to = "TEMP") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=DATE_TTIME, y=TEMP, color=SENSOR)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_line() +
  scale_colour_viridis_d(option = "cividis") + 
  #scale_color_viridis(discrete=TRUE) + 
  theme_bw()
```

### 最低気温

```{r}
esp32 %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = c(ADT7410_TEMP, SHTC30_TEMP), names_to = "SENSOR", values_to = "TEMP") %>%
  mutate(DATE = floor_date(DATE_TTIME, unit="day")) %>% 
  group_by(DATE) %>% 
  slice(which.min(TEMP)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=DATE, y=TEMP)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_line() +
  theme_bw()

```

### 最高室温と最低室温

```{r}
esp32 %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = c(ADT7410_TEMP, SHTC30_TEMP), names_to = "SENSOR", values_to = "TEMP") %>%
  mutate(DATE = floor_date(DATE_TTIME, unit="day")) %>% 
  group_by(DATE) %>% 
  summarise(TEMP_MIN = min(TEMP), TEMP_MAX=max(TEMP)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = c(TEMP_MIN, TEMP_MAX), names_to = "MIN_MAX", values_to = "TEMP") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=DATE, y=TEMP, color=MIN_MAX)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_line() +
  scale_colour_viridis_d(option = "cividis", direction = -1) + 
  theme_bw()

```


### 温度の誤差

```{r}
esp32 %>%
  mutate(DELTA = ADT7410_TEMP - SHTC30_TEMP) -> errors

errors %>% 
  summarise(n = n(),
            mean = mean(DELTA),
            sd = sd(DELTA),
            median = median(DELTA))

errors %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=DATE_TTIME, y=DELTA)) +
  geom_point()

errors %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=DELTA)) +
  geom_density() +
  stat_theodensity(colour = "red")

```
